subject: Football
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Coach Eric Mangini continued his makeover of Cleveland’s roster by signing the free-agent linebacker David Bowens and releasing right tackle Kevin Shaffer. Bowens, 31, played for Mangini the past two seasons with the Jets. He is the third former Jets player to join Mangini in Cleveland.
